org.openntf.osgiworlds
Class ODA_VaadinServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          com.vaadin.server.VaadinServlet
              org.openntf.osgiworlds.ODA_VaadinServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.server.Constants, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class ODA_VaadinServlet
extends com.vaadin.server.VaadinServlet

Author:
Paul Withers

OsgiWorlds extension of VaadinServlet class, allowing us to start and terminate Domino threads and application configuration automatically.
See Also:
Serialized Form
